content.description_1: I`m a student in the last year at University of Informatics in my city. I`m very creative and i have a lot of ideas and in the same time i like to implement them by creating web and android applications.
content.description_2: Since i was 12 years old i like the idea to have my own game and after i bought a new computer my first programing languages was C++ Blueprints in Unreal Engine 4, but because it need a high end computer i can`t continue with UE4 and i moved towards to C# Unity where i created 2 games. After i went to HighSchool i applied to interships where i learned the basics of hardware and programing langauges for Arduino(java) and Raspberry PI(python). And when i enter to university i choosed to create Web Applications and Android. Lots of my projects are based on PHP, JS, Java(Android)!

first.name: Web Development
first.desc: I'm not a web development NASA expert but i can finish my app with the knowledge i have.

second.name: Android Apps
second.desc: I enjoy the fact that you can use android components (Sensors,GPS) to create awesome apps.

third.name: Teamwork
third.desc: I like to help other. A lot. I litteraly join in any hard hard work and with the knowledge i`ve got during the process of solving my work, i`ll help others based on that!

first.description: In those 2 years i will learn high concepts of Machine Learning, Artificial Inteligence and Autonomous Driving as well as programing them.

second.description: A new way to increase my knowledge in software programming. Learning Web Development frontend and backend for the last 3 years.

third.school: High School of Electronics and Automation
third.description: Learning the basics of software and hardware programing. Using Arduino, Raspberry PI, Robots Components to build a Weather Station and Solar Panels.

first.description: Working as a Vodafone representative where we troubleshoot problems, give informations and resolve consumer services.

second.description: I learn the basics of Web Development. We had to develop a dynamic website using a MVC from Laravel Framework and deploy a web app.

third.description: I was working as a sales representative at Kaspersky where we call clients to sell Kaspersky antivirus products for consumer and bussiness.

p1.name: My Own Portfolio
p1.desc: My first online web portofolio was made in React JS.

p2.name: Grovayo
p2.desc: My university final project was a social web page created in Laravel PHP.

p3.name: Hardware Dashboard
p3.desc: Dashboard to get all informations about user and device he is using and info for app server!

p4.name: Doodle Jump Copy
p4.desc: A game maded in Unity C# which is a copy of the popular game doodle jump for android!
